SPECTRUM_ARGB - Static variable in class uk.co.silentsoftware.config.SpectrumDefaults
Mappings from RGB -> ZX Spectrum palette (technically this is a slightly intermediate step as the mappings are not all 1 to 1 with the Spectrum palette, but mappings to a bit set used by the SCR converter).

submitPreviewWork(Image, DitherStrategy) - Static method in class uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher.WorkDispatcher
Similar to submit work (the same processing procedure is followed) however no SCR output is provided, the default resolution of 256x192 is used and the dither can be specified.
submitWork(Image, boolean) - Static method in class uk.co.silentsoftware.dispatcher.WorkDispatcher
Submit an image to be pre processed and processed by a single thread The resulting Future contains the resulting buffered image and optional SCR bytes.
